law.text: As used in KRS 42.0171, 42.0172, and 42.425, unless the context requires otherwise, "state agency" means any state administrative body, department or division as defined by KRS 42.005.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 49, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 32, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 447, sec. 9, effective January 1, 1984. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 48. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618-69.
